Keystroke stacking: <ref name="xautomation">xautomation and xdotool can be used to generate keystrokes under X Window System; or a program can be run in a pseudoterminal to be able to control it (as with the expect tool).</ref>

Subshells: (via %@EXECSTR[] and %@EXEC[]  or via SET /M  ESET /M and UNSET /M and %@MASTER[…])

TCP/UDP connections as streams: (via FTP  TFTP  FTPS  SFTP  HTTP  HTTPS and IFTP  client only)
